HomePage.title: Simple Portfolio App
HomePage.description: A simple portfolio management application built with Next.js, TypeScript et shadcn.

About.title: About Simple Portfolio App
About.description:
<bold>Simple Portfolio App</bold> is a simple web app to manage portfolios.
The frontend is written in <bold>Typescript</bold> and uses <bold>Next.js</bold>, <bold>Tailwind</bold> and <bold>shadcn</bold>.
The backend is written in <bold>Python</bold> (with <bold>FastAPI</bold> and <bold>SQLAlchemy</bold>).
